CustomField.formula: IF ( VALUE(TEXT(Out_of_3_rating__c)) > 0, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001HxdW", "*", 16, 16), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001HxdX", "-", 16, 16)) + IF ( VALUE(TEXT(Out_of_3_rating__c)) > 1, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001HxdW", "*", 16, 16), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001HxdX", "-", 16, 16)) + IF ( VALUE(TEXT(Out_of_3_rating__c)) > 2, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001HxdW", "*", 16, 16), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001HxdX", "-", 16, 16))
CustomField.label: Out of 3 Lightbulbs
